programme.title: Romana O Brtal
programme.desc: Based on Moroccan folklore, the series depicts a number of different folk tales, using the events to show pointed messages and moral lessons.

programme.title: Al Yatima
programme.desc: Saeeda is an orphan girl raised by Ibrahim after the death of her parents. As she finds out that Ibrahim seized her inheritance from her father to build his company, she learns that her mother is still alive, so she begins her journey to search for her while going through a series of difficult events.

programme.title: Al-Ghariba
programme.desc: Sou'ad decides to return home, but her ideas, principles, and dreams alienate her from everyone around her. She starts her life in the publishing house, through which she will establish a new culture in dealing with her work environment, family, and friends.

programme.title: Dar Esselâa
programme.desc: The Nabali family is regarded as one of the most prestigious families in Fez, which owns the "commodity house" that sells traditional products. The seemingly happy family is in for a surprise when a strange woman appears, telling them that she had married their late father 25 years ago.

programme.title: Black and White Love
programme.desc: The life of Ferhat, a dark man who claims lives for a living, is intertwined with the life of Dr. Asli Çinar, who has devoted her life to healing others. Will he claim her life? Or will she be able to heal him?

programme.title: L' Maktoub
programme.desc: As a family seeks to keep its inheritance, its members decide to marry off Omar Al-Maatawi to his brother's wife after his death in order to achieve that end, but Omar's heart is attached to the girl Hind, who looks very similar to his deceased wife.

programme.title: Hadidan W Bent El Harraz
programme.desc: Hadidan returns with new tales and characters, as Hadidan returns to his hometown after the Prince seeks his help to rescue El Harraz and his daughter, who were captured by a rebel leader. Hadidan uses his cunning and intelligence to find El Harraz's daughter and achieve peace inside the city of Casbah.

programme.title: Merati w Zogati
programme.desc: A comedy about (Ramez Galal) who marries a girl interested in women's rights , which makes her too busy and lacks interest in her marital life and that leads him to marry another woman, and he gets into many problems, and comical paradoxes that turn his life into hell.

programme.title: El Jaida
programme.desc: Four women end up at Dar Jawad (women's prison) before the independence of Tunisia, despite their different ages and social conditions. They're forced to coexist under the authority and injustice of their jailer, El Jaida. They share memories of the outside world, and their different emotions.

programme.title: Khali min El-Cholesterol
programme.desc: Ayyoub is a young man who works in the advertizing field; thanks to his autistic mother who helps him to find new ideas. His boss tries to divert his ideas to be exploited in an illegal way. Ayyoub does not give up and decides to take revenge on his boss.

programme.title: Fasel Wa Na‘oud
programme.desc: A taxi driver, Araby (Karim Abdel Aziz) goes to battle with his father-in-law over the custody of his son after Araby is widowed. Though he wins custody, his son is kidnapped and Araby is attacked, losing his memory in the process.

programme.title: Tahqiq mae muatana
programme.desc: The film revolves around Nadia (Suhair Ramzi), who hides Tawfiq (Farouk al-Fishawi) the outlaw after forcing her to help him. When the police find out, Nadia is arrested for interrogation, and Tawfiq remains a fugitive,torn between his guilty conscience and his hope to escape prison.

programme.title: Eazazil abn alshaytan
programme.desc: With an evil sorcery talisman, the devil Azazel is resuscitated to harm an innocent girl. Azazel first requests a sacrifice, which he is granted. So he haunts the innocent girl, driving her to commit mad and horrific acts. But the girl's childhood friend, who happens to have experience in revealing sorcery, finds out the plot, and the lovers eventually unite against Azazel the devil.

programme.title: Ghawi Hobb
programme.desc: Salah leaves the police academy for singing, he meets his childhood sweetheart Malak ,who's now married to a man working in illegal trade. When Malak's husband finds out about Salah, he begins to interfere.

programme.title: Al Moshtaba
programme.desc: A mysterious traffic accident costs the life of Magdy, the businessman. When the police begin investigating the accident, a mysterious hit man comes to the forefront and makes an attempt on the life of the heroine and her daughter. Thus, a link is drawn between these successive events that seem to make a suspect out of everyone involved.

programme.title: Ard el Khouf
programme.desc: Yehia, an idealistic police officer is chosen to delve into the drug dealing world undercover. Yehia becomes a drug dealer, sending periodic reports to his superiors. After a while he discovers that his reports are not reaching anyone. Now without a proof that he's a police officer he's hunted by the police.

programme.title: Hrub mae sabaq al'iisrar
programme.desc: A rich man marries a girl whom he loves but does not live a happy life because of his violence towards her as a result of being subjected to violence from his uncle's wife who raised him. His wife leaves him and returns to her country, but he follows her to Lebanon, and the events continues.

programme.title: The Conqueror of Darkness
programme.desc: A biographical movie that narrates the life story of Taha Hussein, The Dean of Arabic Literature, who came from a small village and fought against all difficulties, including poverty, ignorance, and even darkness, to become a figure of enlightenment.

programme.title: Abu Al-layl
programme.desc: Abo El-Leil is a mysterious masked man, and no one knows what is behind that mask, that's why they fear him. Ahmed is trying to disclose Abo El-Leil's true identity to defeat him.

programme.title: Ya Azeezi Kolona Lussous
programme.desc: Murtada al-Salamuni's father's mansion gets seized and his wife leaves him, forcing him to reside in his family's country house. He tries to find work at Abdullah Bahnas, but he rejects him. Murtada decides to take revenge by cooperating with three thieves. led by Mahrous to steal important papers from by Abdullah to blackmail him.

programme.title: Hakam alzaman
programme.desc: Engineer Adel returns to Cairo from his trip to Europe. He starts searching for his beloved Widad. He finds out that she's not the daughter of the wealthy Mrs. Nemat, and that she left home to work as a singer.

programme.title: Ahlan Ya Captin
programme.desc: Raafat works on one of the ships and meets with his ex-girlfriend Madiha, who refuses to marry him because she wants to marry a wealthy person. Both Raafat and Madiha plot to make millionaire Azzouz falls in love with Madiha so that she can have his money and realize her dream at the same time.

programme.title: Hayah Wi Amal
programme.desc: Footballer Kamal and Salwa are a happily married couple, but their happiness vanishes when Kamal travels for an important game, and the plane crashes in the sea.

programme.title: Al Thalab Wal Enab
programme.desc: Mohsen lives with his sister Aida and her husband Ezzat. After he graduated from the university, his colleague Najwa urges Mohsen to look for work so that they can get married. Ezzat tries to help Mohsen get a job but Mohsen fails in every job.

programme.title: Aleamyl 77
programme.desc: A group of spies who want to obtain Egyptian military secrets pretends to be a foreign cinema crew who came to film some scenes inside Egypt. During one of their operations, the microfilm comes to the possession of a trio of men who witness a murder, putting their lives at risk.

programme.title: Habibty Sahqeya Giddan
programme.desc: A girl (Suheir Ramzi) tells her friends that she lives in an upscale neighborhood and her father is a high rank in the government while she lives a poor life. She comes up with a rumor that a famous tennis player had fallen in love with her, and the tennis player (Nour Al-Sharif) finds out and plays along.

programme.title: Allaylat al'akhira
programme.desc: During 1942, Nadia Burhan lives with her mother in Alexandria, Fawzia lives with her husband Shaker, whom she married against her family's will. Nadia meets Salah and agree to get married. Fawzia dies from a German bombardment of the city, and Nadia has amnesia and Fawzia's husband tries to delude Nadia that she's Fawzia.

programme.title: The Man Who Sold His Skin
programme.desc: The story follows the journey of Sam Ali, a young Syrian who was forced to flee from Syria to Lebanon to escape the Syrian war, hoping to go to Paris later to meet his girlfriend and search for a safe haven.

programme.title: Salma
programme.desc: Hoping to fulfill a promise she made to herself, Salma sets out on an extremely difficult two-night adventure, during which she goes through many difficulties and challenges in order to achieve her goal.

programme.title: Gaza Mon Amour
programme.desc: The life of a simple fisherman, Issa, takes a turn when his fishing net gets an unusual catch: a statue of Apollo. As he hides the statue, he experiences a personality change as his confidence starts to grow, allowing him to try and woo the woman he has been silently carrying a torch for.

programme.title: The Man Who Sold His Skin
programme.desc: The story follows the journey of Sam Ali, a young Syrian who was forced to flee from Syria to Lebanon to escape the Syrian war, hoping to go to Paris later to meet his girlfriend and search for a safe haven.

programme.title: Al-Kabir Awy 6
programme.desc: In the sixth season, after several years, Al-Kabir is exposed to many changes, as he tries to take care of his two sons, while Johnny is going through many difficulties after becoming obese.

programme.title: Dayman Amer
programme.desc: Amer impersonates an educational doctor to enter the Vision School and work there after he plans this with his friend Lotfi, the secretary of the school manager, Zahra. While he succeeds in gaining the trust and love of the people around him, he hides something from everyone

programme.title: Maktoub Aalia
programme.desc: Galal's life turns upside down as a result of an odd meeting with a random stranger, as he finds everything that will happen to him during the day written on his body, turning his days into a series of funny situations.

programme.title: Jazeerat Ghamam
programme.desc: When Khaldoun and the gypsy Al-Ayqa settle on Ghamam island, they try to control its people, thinking that it contains a treasure and a great secret that no one knows. As they try to extend their influence to implement their plan, will the people of the island confront them led by Arafat, El Ajami, and Muharib?

programme.title: Al Ekhteyar 3: Al Qarar
programme.desc: This season depicts the events Egypt witnessed in the years following the January 25 Revolution, leading to the Muslim Brotherhood's rise to power, and the crises that afflicted Egypt during that period causing a state of popular anger against the group and Mohamed Morsi, which ended in the outbreak of the June 30 Revolution.

programme.title: Al Aaedoun
programme.desc: The events revolve around the attempts of the Egyptian intelligence to confront terrorism represented by ISIS, as the intelligence workers, including officers, communication experts, and secret agents, perform their roles in operations aimed at protecting the homeland and eliminating terrorism.

programme.title: Harret El Qubba 2
programme.desc: Ghazi's life is upended after Abu El Ezz opens Abu Ghazi's will and knows that Fares has taken over the management of the village. Will Ghazi give in? And will Tabanja reveal the secret that Zahra hides from Abu El Ezz?

programme.title: Shoghl Fi Al Ali
programme.desc: Jalila and Sherwet are two different women united by their bad luck and failed marriages. As they become friends, they resort to forming a gang to take revenge on men, but when they're faced with a surprise their friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: Jouqat Aziza
programme.desc: The series follows the story of Aziza Khawkha, the dancer who charmed people in the Levant during the 1930s and was named the Queen of Theater during the French occupation of Syria. As a French colonel falls in love with her, he tries to control her life to get her to love him back.

programme.title: Maa Waqf Al Tanfeez
programme.desc: The events take place in Al-Attarin neighborhood after Etab flees for being accused of adultery by her brothers, while Fawzan is ready to do whatever it takes to extend his power.

programme.title: Mohammad Ali Road 2
programme.desc: Everyone in the town thinks that everything has become calm after the death of Shipmaster Abu Shehab (Shehab's father) and Abdel Wahab. Mashary tries to control things with Kamal, but the appearance of Yassin turns things upside down, and he becomes the real ruler.

programme.title: Kayd Al Hareem
programme.desc: After Somaya marries a man in his sixties, she becomes a stepmother to two daughters and a married son and lives a quiet life. However, after her husband's death, her luck goes downhill, and she finds herself in conflict with everyone around her.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Sayed Hassan, also known as Pablo, is a self-made man who helps the needy. As he manages to win the trust of a businessman, the latter's son grows a strong hatred for him, while his sister is head over heels in love with Pablo.

programme.title: Al Zaqqum
programme.desc: In the forties, the two friends, Abdulaziz and Nasser, seize the inheritance of a rich man, flee during the outbreak of the epidemic, succeed in establishing large-scale projects, and live with their families in affluence, but before long, things take an unexpected turn, and they get hoist by their own petard.

programme.title: Kasr Adm
programme.desc: The powerful man Al-Hakam facilitates illegal smuggling through some corrupt policemen, despite the fact that his son Rayan is a police officer who goes after outlaws.

programme.title: Aaelat Abdel Hamid Hafez
programme.desc: Memories dominate Abdel Hamid’s life, especially as he recalls when he was a student how much he loved Abdel Halim Hafez’s voice which echoes in every corner of his house. As Abdel Hamid deals with the burdens of his family, he decides to make a fateful decision that shocks everyone.

programme.title: Wojooh
programme.desc: The series is split into two stories: Third Face and Metaverse. Third Face tells the story of a doctor who gets released from prison and goes on a quest to find her daughter while struggling with psychosis. On the other hand, Metaverse tells the story of a woman who enters the virtual world to take revenge against her enemies.

programme.title: U-Turn
programme.desc: Yara abandons her dream job as a navigation officer for the sake of her possessive husband Youssef, while Khaled causes a tragic accident that puts Yara in grave danger.

programme.title: Hayya Al Rouh
programme.desc: The story follows an angelic girl named Haya, who, despite her disability, defies all circumstances and insists on confronting them, especially her uncle Mubarak, who left her in the care of her stepfather, Abdul Rahman.

programme.title: Theeab Habbab Al Reeh
programme.desc: An epic Bedouin series featuring an epic hero called Theeab, who is a poet, knight, and lover. Theeab is both close to peril and a stranger among his people.

programme.title: Kayd Al Hareem
programme.desc: After Somaya marries a man in his sixties, she becomes a stepmother to two daughters and a married son and lives a quiet life. However, after her husband's death, her luck goes downhill, and she finds herself in conflict with everyone around her.

programme.title: El Kandoush 2
programme.desc: The events resume in season 2, as it becomes clear that there are hidden motives behind Yasmine's marriage to Azmi as she thinks he is behind the murder of her father, which prompts her to plot against him. Azmi's life is turned upside down after the police arrest his brother Rashad.

programme.title: Ala Qayd Al Hobb
programme.desc: Amin and Hassan are both friends and in-laws, but will their relationship and family ties survive the revelation that Walid and Lina are married in secret, or will this expose the grudges held by many?

programme.title: Nuh El-ayn
programme.desc: Between the struggle of good and evil, tales arise, as the domineering shipmaster Omran is looking forward to having an heir, while a brother takes care of his sister, and the selfish rich man who is frequently marrying.

programme.title: Nashemeyat Men Al Badia
programme.desc: A Bedouin drama in a series of separate, connected episodes that tells stories from the depth of the desert about some women, who are known for their strength, steadfastness, and courage in defending the tribe and honor, interspersed with stories of the love they experience.

programme.desc: The events take place in the Qaimriya Damascene neighborhood in the period between the establishment of the Hijazi railway line and the end of the Ottoman rule. programme.desc: When Emma wakes up one morning, she finds herself handcuffed to her dead husband in their remote lakehouse. But much to her shock, that’s not the end of her nightmare, as she discovers that there are hired killers on her trail.

programme.title: The Trip to Greece
programme.desc: In the fourth film in The Trip series, actors Rob Brydon and Steve Coogan resume their tradition of trying local cuisine and visiting ancient landmarks as they take a trip from Troy to Ithaca.

programme.title: Amber and Grace
programme.desc: The story follows the healing journey of an LA teen girl, Amber, who goes to a ranch in Arizona called Rancho Milagro, after she has been subjected to sex trafficking.

programme.title: Brian Banks
programme.desc: The true story of how Brian Banks, a high school football star with a bright future, got wrongly convicted of rape and fought to prove his innocence after getting released from prison so that he could pursue his dream of playing in the NFL.

programme.title: Gunpowder Milkshake
programme.desc: Sam, a professional assassin, has to seek the help of her estranged hitwoman mother to save an 8 year-old girl, when a mission she’s on goes awry.

programme.title: Black and Blue
programme.desc: When a new African-American New Orleans cop witnesses a group of corrupt policemen ruthlessly kill a drug dealer, she tries to balance the two sides of her identity as the said men chase her all through the night to eliminate the evidence she has on them.

programme.title: Under the Stadium Lights
programme.desc: The inspiring true story of a high school football team in Abilene, Texas who overcomes all odds to win the state championship, but soon the team goes through many obstacles in the final stages.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: The elite soldier Ray Garrison is brought back to life by an advanced technology that gives him superhuman strength. As he struggles to remember his past, he begins to uncover a conspiracy far bigger than he imagined.

programme.title: Gunpowder Milkshake
programme.desc: Sam, a professional assassin, has to seek the help of her estranged hitwoman mother to save an 8 year-old girl, when a mission she’s on goes awry.

programme.title: Dreamcatcher
programme.desc: When two estranged sisters and their friends go to an underground music festival where they meet the famous DJ known as the Dreamcatcher, things take a terrifying turn when they find themselves terrorized by a masked serial killer.

programme.title: In the Heights
programme.desc: A musical drama that provides a new take on the Broadway musical that sees a young bodega owner being torn between closing his store and going back to the Dominican Republic, as he learns he inherited his grandmother's fortune.

programme.title: 47 Hours to Live
programme.desc: Bored out of their minds, two teenagers seek a way to spend their time by turning into the internet for fun. But in their search for scary stories, they end up stumbling into a supernatural curse that puts their lives on the line.

programme.title: Deathstroke Knights & Dragons: The Movie
programme.desc: The assassin Deathstroke is forced to face the consequences of his actions, as the lives of his family become at stake, threatened by the terrorist organization H.I.V.E. and its villainous leader The Jackal.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A gruesome murder is discovered in the Louvre, and the clues in Da Vinci's work point to a secret about religion that has been protected by a secret society for 2000 years. Robert Langdon, symbologist, works to uncover the secret which has the ability to shake the very principles of Christianity.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: Paul Blart works as a security guard at the New Jersey mall. For many years, Paul was applying to work as a policeman, but he always failed the physical test because of his diabetes. One day, an armed gang robbed the mall, and held hostages inside, including his daughter. Because of Paul's sense of security, he becomes the police's eye inside the mall, and the only one able to stand to them.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: Will Smith and son Jaden co-star as the legendary Cypher and son Kitai, who crash land on an abandoned Earth a millennium after humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, teenage Kitai has to brave the hostile environment, brimming with aggressive evolved animal species and aliens, on his own to look for help.

programme.title: Cop Out
programme.desc: When Jimmy Monroe decides to sell a precious baseball card in order to get the necessary money for his daughter’s wedding, the card gets stolen, and Jimmy recruits his fellow cop Peter to find the thief who turns out to be a football-memorabilia-obsessed gangster.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Armed with a technology that enables him to enter people's dreams and get access to their subconscious, Dom is hired to carry out a complicated task: set up the perfect circumstances to plant an idea in the mind of a businessman in the dream world.

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: Accused of fraud and sentenced to prison, millionaire James King enlists the help of a friend, Darnell Lewis, to help teach him how to cope with prison life. Along the way, the two men discover they have been wrong about many things, even about their regard for one another.

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: In Sierra Leone, Solomon Vandy is separated from his family and forced to work in mines, where he finds a diamond and hides it. When he's arrested, he meets Danny Archer the arms trafficker, who offers to help him find his family in exchange for the priceless diamond.

programme.desc: The vampire Selene(Kate Beckinsale) awakes from a 12 years cryogenic sleep and she discovers eliminating the Vampire and Lycan species from Earth, however she keeps on searching for her boyfriend Michael. She finds out that she has a daughter ,Eve,who has superpowers making her wanted by the Lycans.

programme.desc: Nick and Suzanne are newlyweds who live with their two children, Lindsey and Kevin. When Suzanne gets pregnant, they decide to move to the suburbs for a better life for their family. They are able to afford a house that needs a lot of fixing up, and when Nick finally caves in and calls a contractor, things somehow get worse.

programme.desc: A hell of a weekend awaits Mr. Moll when he is called to work overtime at the Chocolate Factory, a daunting task with his children as well as his boss' arguing over candies and homework among other things, turning the weekend into an utter state of chaos.

programme.desc: A major contracting company manages to obtain permission to demolish an entire local neighborhood and build luxury towers instead. Magda, a member of the People's Assembly, adopts the issue and the President asks to see her. She decides to show him the documents proving the corruption of officials.

programme.title: Belia We Demagho El Aliaa
programme.desc: Emad (nicknamed Belia), a car mechanic in a poor neighborhood, falls in love with a rich girl called Donia, after he met her at his workshop. But there is another man who is competing with Belia to win her heart, specially as he is aiming to take over her father's fortune.

programme.title: Naher El Khouf
programme.desc: Three young men fight with the parents of a girl who they harassed. Abdulrahman and his colleague panic and ride the river bus. When they see a police officer on the beach and think that he came to arrest them, Abdulrahman takes his gun and tells the driver not to stop.

programme.title: Azmat sakan
programme.desc: Both Fattouh and Afaf try to find an apartment in Cairo, and the general manager gives Fattouh the apartment in exchange for having the place for fun and meeting mistresses but Afaf got the apartment when she disguised herself as a man and paradoxes happen between her and the residents.

programme.title: Estobb
programme.desc: Fattouh works in change currency and heroin . He is surprised that his girlfriend Susu has become addicted. A Zionist drug smuggling organization recruits him to steal the serum of scientist Dr. Nomani, that purifies the blood of addiction. Fattouh decides to take down the members of the organization and help the police catches them.

programme.title: Ana Fi Aynayhi
programme.desc: Amal, a poor young woman, is injured in a car accident by the wealthy Adel, who treats her. They get married but problems arise between them because he doesn't work. He refuses to operate the factory left by his father because he was the cause of his death when he was a child.

programme.title: Hanafy El Obbaha
programme.desc: Hanafi al'abiha steals a jewelry shop with his partners and hides the bag with his brother Ahmad before they were arrested. His three accomplices escape and kidnap Ahmed's wife Duaa until they recover the bag. Hanafi is temporarily released to lead the Police to the place of his colleagues, and the events follow.

programme.title: El-qalb loh wahid
programme.desc: After Souad graduates from boarding school, she goes to live with her father, stepmother, and her daughter who treat her harshly. Souad falls in love with Raouf, a family friend who shares the same feelings, but her stepmother tries to make him marry her daughter.

programme.title: Angham
programme.desc: Retired singer Najwa devotes her life to raising her son Magdy,who's in his senior year in Medical school. But he studies music and hides it from his mother. When she finds out, Magdy leaves home and meets the dancer Tamatem and lives with her.

programme.title: Qalb El-Assad
programme.desc: This action thriller set in a dark criminal underworld revolves around the tough, self-reliant Faris, who was kidnapped as a child and raised at the circus among the lions and the tigers. Faris now works at the circus as a lion tamer, but gets sucked into a murder mystery.

programme.title: Allail Attaweel
programme.desc: Four political activists friends are arrested by the repressive regime in Syria in the 1970s and spend twenty years in detention, three of them are released, and the fourth remains. The three friends are shocked by the huge changes they found in society, while showing the hardships their fourth comrade faces in prison.

programme.title: X Large
programme.desc: Magdy is an overweight man who suffers from loneliness, in spite of having many friends who prefer talking to him about their problems, his obesity makes them not think of him as a husband. But when he meets his childhood friend Dina, he tries to get closer to her but discovers that she took him as a case for her research in the University.

programme.title: Mattarr Aylul
programme.desc: A man, whose wife had died, lives in poverty with his five children.Three of the children are singers and musicians, working as such. What they discover is that you don't just play Jumanji - you must survive it in order to beat the game and return to the real world.

programme.title: The Transporter Refueled
programme.desc: When former mercenary-turned-contract driver Frank Martin is hired by a mysterious woman for a job, he finds himself embroiled in a dangerous game, since the woman has her own vendetta that she wants to settle with a Russian mobster.

programme.title: American Animals
programme.desc: Based on a true story, four young men attempt one of the most audacious heists in U.S. history by trying to steal a collection of rare books from the private collection at the University of Transylvania, but they discover that the plan has taken a different course from what they had planned.

programme.title: Stockholm
programme.desc: The strange yet true story of the notorious hostage situation that took place in 1973 Stockholm.

programme.title: Horns

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Çukurova
programme.desc: When the romance between Züleyha and Yilmaz faces external complications, the two lovers are forced to go on the run to escape danger. In order to stay together, the two pose as siblings as they start working on a farm in Adana.

programme.title: Waltaqayna

programme.desc: James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along film.James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along, and try to bust some drug dealing operations in Miami, before Ben’s wedding to James’ sister.

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Jerry and Rachel meet each other through a mysterious phone call from a woman they've never met, threatening their lives and pushing them into a chain of risky situations by using modern technology and carefully monitoring their movements.

programme.title: Baahubali: The Beginning
programme.desc: After growing up isolated from the world, Shivudu's adventurous nature leads him out of his homeland. His journey leads him to discover his true origins and the bloody dispute that led to him being raised away from his rightful royal place.

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: Dangerous criminal Richard B. Riddick (Diesel) is being transported to prison in a cargo spacecraft. When the spaceship is damaged by comet debris and makes an emergency crash landing on an empty desert planet, Riddick escapes. However, when predatory alien creatures begin attacking the survivors, Riddick joins forces with the crew to develop a plan to escape the planet.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Frankenstein's monster becomes involved in an ancient war between two immortal clans of demons and gargoyles.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: This action epic brings to life the real tale of 47 samurai warriors who in 18th century Japan set out on a quest to avenge the death of their master, killed by a treacherous overlord who banished them from their homeland.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A drone repairman (Tom Cruise) is sent back to an evacuated Earth where a human-alien war sixty years ago wiped out half the planet. He makes a shocking discovery that causes him to question everything he knows about his world, his mission and himself.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future Chicago setting, people are divided into five distinct factions based on their personalities. Beatrice discovers that she is Divergent, meaning she does not fit into any one faction, and soon uncovers a sinister plot brewing in her seemingly perfect society.

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: CIA operative Tom Bishop asks the retired Nathan Muir to help him when he is arrested in China. While on this mission, Nathan recalls all the situations that affected his and Tom's relationship.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: The Naval Fighter Weapons School witnesses a fierce competition between two students, nicknamed Maverick and Iceman, as they try to win the school's top trophy.

programme.title: Monstrum
programme.desc: Yoon Gyeom finds himself facing many people trying to get rid of King Jung Jong, while a ferocious monster attacks the kingdom of Joseon.

programme.title: Tremors: Shrieker Island
programme.desc: When a hunting party head to Dark Island to hunt down Graboids, things take a terrifying turn when they find themselves being hunted by genetically modified Graboids and the increasingly multiplying Shriekers.

programme.desc: When a group of teens joins the stalker club, their safety is threatened as a teenage girl becomes the target of a masked stalker when she participates in a dangerous game.

programme.desc: As Curtis tries to make it as a music manager, he provides a career change for a girls' band that consists of three soul singers. programme.title: The Birthday Wish
programme.desc: When Gwen's plans to get engaged on her 30th birthday fall through, she makes a wish to be able to see into the future. But instead of offering answers, her glimpse into the future sends her into a tailspin as it raises questions about whether she is with the right man.

programme.title: Stalked by My Mother
programme.desc: When her boyfriend is killed, Maddy is accused of being the culprit, but she points the finger at her own mother instead. Little do they both know that the boyfriend was never the target, and that real culprit is closer than they think.

programme.title: Grace Unplugged
programme.desc: An aspiring singer, Grace, defies her rock-star-turned-pastor father and leaves for LA in search of stardom. But the glamour of fame has a darker side as the teenage Grace comes to find out over the course of a journey that will test her faith, resolve, and resilience.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: The film tells of a suspicious video of some strange scenes, after the viewer sees it, he gets a phone call telling him that he will die after 7 days.

programme.title: Unlocked
programme.desc: CIA interrogator Jack Alcott is lured into a ploy that could eventually lead to a catastrophic biological attack on London.

programme.title: Never Rarely Sometimes Always
programme.desc: When one of them falls pregnant and is pursued by people who want her to have a divorce, two teenage girls flee Pennsylvania and head to New York City to seek the necessary medical help.

programme.title: A Model Kidnapping
programme.desc: When the aspiring model Grace goes to a photoshoot for the fashion photographer Hunter, things take a terrifying turn when she finds herself kidnapped, as she has to find a way to free herself from his clutches.

programme.title: When in Rome
programme.desc: Beth works at the Guggenheim and is very good at her job, so good in fact that one may say that she is perhaps a bit “too good” at it. Love and romance have been forced to take a back seat in her life as she focuses all of her energies on her career. However, all of this changes when she travels to Rome to attend her sister’s wedding and gets to know Nicholas Beamon.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: As Curtis tries to make it as a music manager, he provides a career change for a girls' band that consists of three soul singers. But as he tries to make the band into headliner material, he ends up demoting then firing the lead singer to replace her with another whom he deems more fit for stardom.

programme.title: Help And Freedom
programme.desc: An animated family comedy that follows the daily routine of a group of animals. The distinct quality of these animals, however, is that like any human being, they have the primary instinct to want to make something out of their lives.

programme.title: Marvin Airlines
programme.desc: Marvin wants to leave the farm because he doesn't feel loved by those around him. His friend Grumbo gets a new job in the city's aquarium. Will Marvin leave with Grumbo, or will the others change their minds and get them to stay?

programme.title: Khan Kluay 2
programme.desc: In a battle, Jumbo, the King's elephant, loses both of his parents. When he attempts to distract himself from his sadness by embarking on a series of escapades, he makes a decision that completely changes his life.

programme.title: The Great Bear
programme.desc: Jonathan is an 11-year-old boy who usually spends his vacations with his grandfather, who lives on the edge of a forest filled with mythical animals. When his little sister Sophie joins him, he tries to avoid her, till she gets kidnapped by a giant bear and it's up to him to rescue her.

programme.title: The Apple & The Worm
programme.desc: The story of narcissistic apple Torben, who, like all the apples in the tree, dreams of being shiny, afraid of anything that disturbs its beauty, and when Torben is infected with a worm ,he gets kicked out. On his journey to get the worm out, he meets other characters who change his life for the better.

programme.title: Krazzy Planet
programme.desc: Life on planet Krazzy,is full of fun and prosperity,until a galaxy tyrant decides to invade the planet. Two brave heroes team up with a scientist to confront the invasion attempt to show the true essence of the people of planet Krazzy.

programme.title: Bamse and the Thief City
programme.desc: The most popular Swedish comic book character gets his first feature film. The world's strongest bear Bamse and his friends Little Hopp and Shellman prove that friendship is the best weapon against evil.

programme.title: The Wish Fish
programme.desc: Opil is an 8-year-old boy who detests the dish called 'The Wish Fish' that his mother makes. Resentful of the meal, he wishes that aliens invade the planet and all the fish will vanish. When the wish comes true, a group of villains appears, and Opil starts to realize what he has done.

programme.title: The Fairy Tales Tree
programme.desc: The series follows the characters living in Sprookjesbos, or Fairy Tale Forest, like Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood, and Tom Thumb, with each story having a moral message.

programme.title: Krazzy Planet
programme.desc: Life on planet Krazzy,is full of fun and prosperity,until a galaxy tyrant decides to invade the planet. Two brave heroes team up with a scientist to confront the invasion attempt to show the true essence of the people of planet Krazzy.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: The intelligence of mankind has reached an unimaginable level. A private company created a robot in the form of a child called David, which is adopted by a family that almost lost their child because of his illness. A strong bond between David and his mother Monica develops. But all of this soon turned into a handful of complications after Monica's son healed and returned home.

programme.title: The Secret Life Of Walter Mitty
programme.desc: When his own job is threatened, Walter Mitty decides to escape his dull life and embarks on an adventure to experience living with no boundaries.

programme.title: Overboard
programme.desc: A spoiled, wealthy yacht owner is thrown overboard and loses his memory, when a single working mother decides to take advantage of the situation and tries to convince him that they are married.

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: The true story of boxer James Braddock, who was a boxing champion in the 1930s until he began to suffer injuries and broke his left hand and became poor in a period where only the rich survive, how will he support himself, wife and three children with a broken hand in the winter?

programme.title: A Guy Thing
programme.desc: After having his bachelor party, a guy wakes up next to a woman and thinks that he cheated on his fiancée. He tries to hide it until his wedding, but it doesn't go very smoothly.

programme.title: Prisoners
programme.desc: When Keller Dover's (Hugh Jackman) daughter and her boyfriend go missing, the police start searching for leads to find her, but when they fail due to lack of evidence, Dover takes matters into his own hands.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: A story about family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on the early days of oil exploration in the early twentieth century through Daniel Plainview, a businessman who takes a great opportunity that will change his life.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George Dryer, a charming former Scottish football star, is down on his luck and unable to find a sports-related job to pay his bills. He has a minimal connection with his son, Lewis, but as his ex-wife, Stacie, decides to remarry, he gets despondent and decides to pull his life together for his son and to win her back. To do this, he must rise above temptations, bribery and wrong career choices.

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Shy student Todd Anderson attends the school where his older brother was famous along with his roommate Neil Perry. They meet John Keating, the new English teacher who creates a club called The Dead Poets Society,through which he tries to help his students restore balance in their lives.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: The three Musketeers team up with the lively D'Artagnan to defeat the forces of evil and stop the many attempts to seize the French throne.

programme.title: The Boss Baby: Family Business
programme.desc: After having grown up and drifted apart, Theodore and Tim Templeton team up with a new boss baby, as they work together to thwart the plot of an evil scientist.

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: Dan Sanders is handed down an unenviable assignment from his boss as the latter asks him to clear out a nearby patch of forest in order to turn it into a residential complex. Much to his dismay, Dan finds out that the animals inhabiting the forest will not go without a fight.

programme.title: Anchors Up
programme.desc: After the rescue boat Elias shows his mettle during a storm, he starts a new chapter in his life as he moves to the big harbor. However, he soon comes to discover that the shiny veneer of the harbor hides an ugly truth that he needs his old friends to expose.

programme.title: 102 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Cruella De Vil experiences a change of heart upon her release from prison. Initially cured from her desire for fur coat, the sound of Beg Ben erases the treatment and Cruella is soon plotting to steal Dalmatian puppies to get her coat.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Disney animated fairy tale in which Belle is a bright and independent young girl who is taken captive by a beast in his castle in exchange for releasing her father who accidentally trespassed into that castle. Despite her fear, she learns to befriend the castle's enchanted staff and is able to see beyond the beast's exterior to realise the true heart of the prince within. Belle and the beast fall in love when Gaston, an arrogant hunter, sets out to hunt the beast and take Belle to himself at any cost.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: Through the ages the Minions have been serving evil masters with their despicable plans, they get recruited by super-villain Scarlett Overkill, who's plotting to take over the world.

programme.title: The House with a Clock in its Walls
programme.desc: Lewis Barnavelt is sent to Michigan after losing his parents, to live with his uncle Jonathan. He discovers his uncle is a wizard, and enters a world of magic and sorcery. But this power is not limited to good people: Lewis learns of Isaac Izard, an evil wizard who wanted to cause the Apocalypse so that he could see what happened afterwards.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: As he begins to settle into his new family life, the ex-supervillain Gru is tasked to stop a lethal enemy named El Macho and save the world from his evil plan.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After Sonic the Hedgehog comes to Earth, he hides in the town of Green Hills, and is helped by the town's Sheriff to escape the evil Dr. Robotnik who's hired by the government to capture him.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: After a mysterious fire damages their home and kills their parents, Klause, Violet and Sunny Baudelaire are placed in the care of the evil genius, Count Olaf. The children are then sent to other caretakers, including Uncle Monty and Aunt Josephine, but Count Olaf has his own evil plans for the children.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: Through the ages the Minions have been serving evil masters with their despicable plans, they get recruited by super-villain Scarlett Overkill, who's plotting to take over the world.

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a street boy roaming the big crowded city with his devoted monkey friend, Abu, when he meets princess Jasmine and falls in love with her. When he’s taken to jail, he gets involved in a conspiracy plotted by the Sultan's advisor, Jaafar, with the help of a mysterious lamp that has magical powers.

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: The evil master mind Gru lives in a mansion with his small army of minions, as he prepares for his most daring heist, he comes across three orphaned girls who disrupt his wicked plans.

programme.title: The Great Gilly Hopkins
programme.desc: In an attempt to be reunited with her birth mother, the feisty Gilly Hopkins moves from one foster home to the other, until she settles with her new foster mother Maime Trotter, who develops a strong bond with her.

programme.title: Ice on Fire
programme.desc: The film highlights the problem of climate change, how to resolve it by controlling high carbon levels in the atmosphere, and how to reduce temperatures around the world. It deals with the many human errors that led to this phenomenon and the solutions to remedy it.

programme.title: The Ice Road
programme.desc: An ice driver leads a high-stakes rescue mission to save trapped miners after a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada.

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Based on a true story; a retelling of the negotiations that took place against the backdrop of the Oslo Peace Accords in the 1990s between the Palestinian Liberation Organization and the government of Israel in which Norway acted as an intermediary.

programme.title: Born a Champion
programme.desc: Black-belt BJJ fighter Mickey Kelley loses in an MMA match against Marco Blaine. Years later, it is revealed that the latter cheated, upon which Kelley finally gets a rematch.

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.

programme.title: Unhinged

programme.desc: After the tragic death of his wife, the scientist George Almore lives in an isolated facility as he tries to perfect a prototype of a true human-equivalent AI. But he keeps his real motive hidden, which is to bring his dead wife back to life.

She decides to protect her two daughters from poverty so she returns to Cairo to continue to beg.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: As an American girl arrives in Turkey in the seventies amid a brutal battle for imperialism, she falls head over heels for a Turkish man, but they soon find themselves at a crossroads owing to the conflict between their cultures.

programme.title: Harb Karmooz
programme.desc: In the forties, a girl gets raped by a group of English soldiers. One of the English soldiers is held at the Karmouz police station in the custody of General Youssef Al-Masry. When General Adams has his men besiege the police station to rescue his soldier, it's up to Youssef to hold him off.

programme.title: Eyar Nari
programme.desc: After a clash between demonstrators and security forces, a body from the clash is returned to the morgue. Forensic doctor, Yassin, writes his medical report stating that the victim was shot at close range, unlike the other bodies , problems begin when the medical report is leaked to the media.

programme.title: Zenzana 7
programme.desc: As Harby serves his sentence in prison, the friendship he forms with Mansour survives their incarceration and release. As they manage to make a name for themselves in the crime world, one of their rivals drivers a wedge between them, leaving the two to clash.

programme.title: Al Ekhteyar 3: Al Qarar
programme.desc: This season depicts the events Egypt witnessed in the years following the January 25 Revolution, leading to the Muslim Brotherhood's rise to power, and the crises that afflicted Egypt during that period causing a state of popular anger against the group and Mohamed Morsi, which ended in the outbreak of the June 30 Revolution.

programme.title: Ahlam Saeida
programme.desc: Three middle-aged women, Farida,Sherine and Laila, suffering from insomnia and difficulty sleeping, are brought together by fate to go through experiences that will help them overcome their problems and move on to a better life.

programme.title: U-Turn
programme.desc: Yara abandons her dream job as a navigation officer for the sake of her possessive husband Youssef, while Khaled causes a tragic accident that puts Yara in grave danger.

programme.desc: Amer impersonates an educational doctor to enter the Vision School and work there after he plans this with his friend Lotfi, the secretary of the school manager, Zahra. While he succeeds in gaining the trust and love of the people around him, he hides something from everyone

programme.title: Malayikat alshawarie
programme.desc: Sherifa, the daughter of a wealthy man marries her driver's son Adel. Her father forces Adel to divorce her after she gives birth to Fatma, who is sent to a community home.

programme.title: Bayt El Shedda
programme.desc: The granddaughter of a sorcerer and magician named Falak returns to her grandfather's house, in order to take revenge on those who burned the house in the past. However, there is a curse chasing her son Seif, where his grandfather's spirit controls his body.

programme.title: Maa Waqf Al Tanfeez
programme.desc: The events take place in Al-Attarin neighborhood after Etab flees for being accused of adultery by her brothers, while Fawzan is ready to do whatever it takes to extend his power.

programme.title: Donya Tanya
programme.desc: As school principal Donia Salem is shocked after her son drowned in the swimming pool and her second son lost his speech, she seeks to divorce her husband Hossam after discovering he is cheating on her with her sister.

programme.title: Sanawat El Greesh
programme.desc: Overnight, conditions change, especially with the outbreak of World War II, which reaches the Gulf, and mines stop people from their work, especially hunting, so Ghaith the son of the teacher Sultana decides to travel, and she long waits for his return.

programme.title: Zell
programme.desc: Qais leaves his legal profession because he cannot bear to remain silent about injustice, while Jalal uses the law for his own personal interests. On the other hand, Gibran, the international fashion designer, is trying to overcome the suicide of his girlfriend, Nawara.

programme.title: Inhiraf
programme.desc: Based on a true story; the plot tackles the moral deviation of a number of characters who fall in the hands of a psychiatrist who decides to adjust their lives in her own way.

programme.title: Zawaj Ella Roba'
programme.desc: Childhood friends Hamad and Walid marry and live in the same building. Through these relationships, many paradoxes and stories arise between them.

programme.desc: A young man has achieved wide fame and great success in the culinary field.
